class.name: WatercraftRudder
class.brief_description: Adds a steerable rudder to a [HydroRigidBody].
class.description: This will generate a rudder of a given size and calculate the forces along with the rest of the hull. As with the rest of the hull, only the submerged portion of the rudder will function.

members.member: The extent of the rudder below the origin.
The direction the rudder will face. Change the direction to steer the rudder.
The length of the rudder in the specified direction.
